name: Creed Fighter
description:
This is part of the PICO-8 Advent Calendar 2019! 
See the whole project at https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=36076

For Saint Nicholas Day, I made a game inspired by my favorite St Nick legend: that one time he punched a heretic. It's a 2-player fighting game. Enjoy!

Controls: controllers highly recommended. If you're using a keyboard:
St. Nicholas: X, Z, arrow keys
Arius: A, tab, SFED to move
